typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		lcclcaid as string,
		lccclmtype as string,
		lcclccid as string,
		lccmfkey as string,
		lccalleged1 as string,
		lccalleged2 as string,
		lcccarriagemethod as string,
		lcccause as string,
		lccloconvess as string,
		lccruleofcov as string,
		lcctext as string,
		lccclmdet as string,
		lccuwsign as string,
		lccln6 as integer,
		lccremarks as string,
		lcctrtmco as integer,
		lccrolecat as string,
		lccadddescrlev1 as string,
		lccadddescrlev2 as string,
		lccadddescrlev3 as string,
		lccadddescrlev4 as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'select		\n       lcclcaid,\n		lccclmtype,\n		lcclccid,\n		lccmfkey,\n		lccalleged1,\n		lccalleged2,\n		lcccarriagemethod,\n		lcccause,\n		lccloconvess,\n		lccruleofcov,\n		lcctext,\n		lccclmdet,\n		lccuwsign,\n		lccln6,\n		lccremarks,\n		lcctrtmco,\n		lccrolecat,\n                lccadddescrlev1,\nlccadddescrlev2,\nlccadddescrlev3,\nlccadddescrlev4\n from dwh_stage.p_lcctable',
	format: 'query') ~> Lcc
source(output(
		lcalcaid as string,
		lcaclmdate as date
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'select lcalcaid,lcaclmdate from dwh_stage.p_lcatable',
	format: 'query') ~> Lca
source(output(
		code_type_id as long,
		code2 as string,
		target_description as string,
		source_system as string,
		om_x_ref as string,
		target_code as string,
		code_type as string,
		source_code_key as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'select * from dwh_stage.t_crossreference',
	format: 'query') ~> TCross
source(output(
		clm_code as string,
		pk_key_clm as string,
		clm_description as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'select 		clm_code,\n		pk_key_clm,\n		clm_description \nfrom dwh_prepare.pre_dim_claim_type',
	format: 'query',
	wildcardPaths:['Pre_Dim/pre_dim_claim_type.parquet']) ~> ClmType
Lcc select(mapColumn(
		lcclcaid,
		lccclmtype,
		lcclccid,
		lccmfkey,
		lccalleged1,
		lccalleged2,
		lcccarriagemethod,
		lcccause,
		lccloconvess,
		lccruleofcov,
		lcctext,
		lccclmdet,
		lccuwsign,
		lccln6,
		lccremarks,
		lcctrtmco,
		lccrolecat,
		each(match(left(name,7)=='lccaddd'))
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> LccTable
Lca select(mapColumn(
		lcalcaid,
		lcaclmdate
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> LcaTable
LccTable, LcaTable join(lcclcaid == lcalcaid,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> LccLca
LccLca derive(scl_sub_claim_key = concat('P',lcclccid),
		scl_clm_key = concat('PARIS',lccclmtype),
		scl_inc_key = concat('P',lcalcaid),
		scl_alleged_cause_key = case(iifNull(lccalleged2,'Null') =='Null', lccalleged1, lccalleged2),
		scl_alleged_caused_top_key = lccalleged1,
		scl_carriage_method_key = trim(lcccarriagemethod),
		scl_cause_of_injury_key = lcccause,
		scl_claim_type_spec_key = iifNull(lccadddescrlev4, iifNull(lccadddescrlev3,iifNull(lccadddescrlev2,lccadddescrlev1))),
		scl_rule_of_cover_key = lccruleofcov,
		scl_claim_detail_key = trim(lccclmdet),
		scl_employee_key = lccuwsign,
		scl_clm_status_key = toString(lcctrtmco),
		scl_human_clm_loc_key = lccloconvess,
		scl_title_rank_key = lccrolecat,
		scl_sub_claim_desc = lcctext,
		scl_sub_claim_number = lccln6,
		scl_member_sub_claim_reference = lccmfkey,
		scl_sub_claim_remarks = lccremarks,
		scl_gard_sub_claim_id = lccmfkey) ~> Expressions
TCross filter(code_type_id == 819 && source_system == 'PARIS') ~> AllegedCause
AllegedCause select(mapColumn(
		source_code_key_all_cau = source_code_key,
		target_code_all_cau = target_code,
		target_description_all_cau = target_description
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> XrefAllegedCause
TCross filter(code_type_id == 820 && source_system == 'PARIS') ~> CarriageMethod
CarriageMethod select(mapColumn(
		source_code_key_CarriageMethod = source_code_key,
		target_code_CarriageMethod = target_code,
		target_description_CarriageMethod = target_description
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> XrefCarriageMethod
TCross filter(code_type_id == 327 && source_system == 'PARIS') ~> CauseOfInjury
TCross filter(code_type_id == 821 && source_system == 'PARIS') ~> ClaimTypeSpec
ClaimTypeSpec select(mapColumn(
		source_code_key_clm_type_spec = source_code_key,
		target_code_clm_type_spec = target_code,
		target_description_clm_type_spec = target_description
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> XrefClaimTypeSpec
CauseOfInjury select(mapColumn(
		source_code_key_cause_injury = source_code_key,
		target_code_cause_injury = target_code,
		target_description_cause_injury = target_description
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> XrefCauseOfInjury
TCross filter(code_type_id == 167 && source_system == 'PARIS') ~> RuleOfCover
RuleOfCover select(mapColumn(
		source_code_key_roc = source_code_key,
		target_code_roc = target_code,
		target_description_roc = target_description
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> XrefRuleOfCover
TCross filter(code_type_id == 775 && source_system == 'PARIS') ~> ClaimDetail
ClaimDetail select(mapColumn(
		source_code_key_claim_detail = source_code_key,
		target_code_claim_detail = target_code,
		target_description_claim_detail = target_description
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> XrefClaimDetail
TCross filter(code_type_id == 822 && source_system == 'PARIS') ~> Status
Status select(mapColumn(
		source_code_key_status = source_code_key,
		target_code_status = target_code,
		target_description_status = target_description
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> XrefStatus
TCross filter(code_type_id == 824 && source_system == 'PARIS') ~> HumanClaimLocation
HumanClaimLocation select(mapColumn(
		source_code_key_hcl = source_code_key,
		target_code_hcl = target_code,
		target_description_hcl = target_description
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> XrefHumanClmLoc
TCross filter(code_type_id == 311 && source_system == 'PARIS') ~> TitleRank
TitleRank select(mapColumn(
		source_code_key_TitleRank = source_code_key,
		target_code_TitleRank = target_code,
		target_description_TitleRank = target_description
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> XrefTitleRank
Expressions select(mapColumn(
		each(match(left(name,3)=='scl'))
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectedColums
SelectedColums, PreDimClmType join(scl_clm_key == pk_key_clm,
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> LccClmType
ClmType select(mapColumn(
		clm_code,
		pk_key_clm,
		clm_description
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> PreDimClmType
LccClmType, XrefAllegedCause join(scl_alleged_cause_key == source_code_key_all_cau,
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> LccAllegedCause
LccAllegedCause, XrefAllCausedTop join(scl_alleged_caused_top_key == source_code_key_allcautop,
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> AllegeCauseTop
TCross filter(code_type_id == 819 && source_system == 'PARIS') ~> AllegedCauseTop
AllegedCauseTop select(mapColumn(
		source_code_key_allcautop = source_code_key,
		target_description_allcautop = target_description
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> XrefAllCausedTop
AllegeCauseTop, XrefCarriageMethod join(scl_carriage_method_key == source_code_key_CarriageMethod,
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> AllCauTopCarriageMthod
AllCauTopCarriageMthod, XrefCauseOfInjury join(scl_cause_of_injury_key == source_code_key_cause_injury,
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> CarriageCauseInjury
CarriageCauseInjury, XrefRuleOfCover join(scl_rule_of_cover_key == source_code_key_roc,
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> CauseRuleOfCover
CauseRuleOfCover, XrefClaimDetail join(scl_claim_detail_key == source_code_key_claim_detail,
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> RuleCoverClmDetail
RuleCoverClmDetail, XrefEmployee join(scl_employee_key == source_code_key_employee,
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> ClmDetEmployee
TCross filter(code_type_id == 329 && source_system == 'PARIS') ~> Employee
Employee select(mapColumn(
		source_code_key_employee = source_code_key,
		target_code_employee = target_code,
		target_description_employee = target_description
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> XrefEmployee
ClmDetEmployee, XrefStatus join(scl_clm_status_key == source_code_key_status,
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> EmployeeStatus
EmployeeStatus, XrefHumanClmLoc join(scl_human_clm_loc_key == source_code_key_hcl,
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> EmployeeHuman
EmployeeHuman, XrefTitleRank join(scl_title_rank_key == source_code_key_TitleRank,
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> HumanTitleRank
HumanClmType derive(scl_sub_claim_type_code = clm_code,
		scl_sub_claim_type_description = clm_description,
		scl_sub_claim_detail_code = iifNull(target_code_claim_detail,'N/A'),
		scl_sub_claim_detail_desc = iifNull(target_description_claim_detail,'Not Applicable'),
		scl_sub_claim_status = iifNull(target_description_status,'Not Applicable'),
		scl_rule_of_cover_code = iifNull(target_code_roc, 'N/A'),
		scl_rule_of_cover_desc = iifNull(target_description_roc, 'Not Applicable'),
		scl_sub_claim_handler_code = iifNull(target_code_hcl, 'N/A'),
		scl_sub_claim_handler_desc = iifNull(target_description_hcl, 'Not Applicable'),
		scl_human_location = iifNull(target_description_hcl,'Not Applicable'),
		scl_cause_of_injury = iifNull(target_description_cause_injury,'Not Applicable'),
		scl_title_rank_top = iifNull(target_description_TitleRank, 'Not Applicable'),
		scl_alleged_cause = iifNull(target_description_all_cau, 'Not Applicable'),
		scl_alleged_cause_top = iifNull(target_description_allcautop, 'Not Applicable'),
		scl_carriage_method = iifNull(target_description_CarriageMethod, 'Not Applicable'),
		scl_claim_type_specification = iifNull(target_description_clm_type_spec, 'Not Applicable')) ~> HandlingNull
HumanTitleRank, XrefClaimTypeSpec join(scl_claim_type_spec_key == source_code_key_clm_type_spec,
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> HumanClmType
HandlingNull select(mapColumn(
		scl_inc_key,
		pk_key = scl_sub_claim_key,
		clm_description,
		each(match(right(name,3)!='key'&&left(name,3)=='scl'))
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> RequiredColumns
RequiredColumns sink(input(
		pk_key as string,
		scl_sub_claim_type_code as string,
		scl_used_deductible_usd as decimal(28,10),
		scl_human_claim_type_top as string,
		scl_bill_of_lading_number as string,
		scl_nationality as string,
		scl_alleged_cause_top as string,
		scl_alleged_cause_path as string,
		scl_inc_key as string,
		scl_title_rank_path as string,
		scl_sub_claim_handler_desc as string,
		scl_sub_claim_desc as string,
		scl_sub_claim_status as string,
		scl_sub_claim_type_desc as string,
		scl_gard_sub_claim_id as string,
		scl_cargo_type as string,
		scl_carriage_method_path as string,
		scl_human_claim_type_path as string,
		scl_sub_claim_detail_code as string,
		scl_place_of_delivery as string,
		scl_sub_claim_number as decimal(28,10),
		scl_carriage_method_top as string,
		scl_cargo_type_path as string,
		scl_cargo_claim_category_path as string,
		scl_claim_type_specific_path as string,
		scl_cargo_claim_category_top as string,
		scl_title_rank as string,
		scl_port_of_discharge_country as string,
		scl_cargo_type_top as string,
		scl_sub_claim_detail_desc as string,
		scl_person_age as decimal(28,10),
		scl_cause_of_injury as string,
		scl_carriage_method as string,
		scl_claim_type_specification as string,
		scl_human_location as string,
		scl_sub_claim_handler_code as string,
		scl_cargo_claim_category as string,
		scl_rule_of_cover_desc as string,
		scl_deleted_ind as string,
		inserted_by as string,
		scl_port_of_loading as string,
		date_last_updated as timestamp,
		scl_sub_claim_date as date,
		scl_place_of_receipt as string,
		scl_member_sub_claim_reference as string,
		scl_human_claim_type as string,
		last_updated_by as string,
		scl_title_rank_top as string,
		scl_port_of_loading_country as string,
		scl_rule_of_cover_code as string,
		scl_port_of_discharge as string,
		scl_alleged_cause as string,
		date_inserted as timestamp,
		scl_sub_claim_remarks as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	preSQLs:['truncate table dwh_prepare.pre_dim_sub_claim'],
	mapColumn(
		pk_key,
		scl_sub_claim_type_code,
		scl_sub_claim_type_desc = clm_description,
		scl_alleged_cause_top,
		scl_inc_key,
		scl_sub_claim_desc,
		scl_sub_claim_status,
		scl_gard_sub_claim_id,
		scl_sub_claim_detail_code,
		scl_sub_claim_number,
		scl_sub_claim_detail_desc,
		scl_cause_of_injury,
		scl_carriage_method,
		scl_claim_type_specification,
		scl_human_location,
		scl_sub_claim_handler_code,
		scl_sub_claim_handler_desc,
		scl_member_sub_claim_reference,
		scl_title_rank_top,
		scl_rule_of_cover_code,
		scl_rule_of_cover_desc,
		scl_alleged_cause,
		scl_sub_claim_remarks
	),
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> PreDimSubClaimPa
